newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentine jobless rate 16.1 percent - source.
newsitem.headline: Argentine jobless rate 16.1 percent - source.

text.p: Argentina's unemployment rate in May, scheduled for release Friday, was 16.1 percent, down from 17.3 percent in October and 17.1 percent in May 1996, a senior government official said Thursday.

The official, who requested anonymity, told Reuters that Carlos Rodriguez, the chief advisor to the economy minister, informed President Carlos Menem of the semi-annual figure during Thursday morning's cabinet meeting.
The unemployment rate was scheduled to be announced at 1100 local/1400 GMT Friday. Additional details, including how many jobs were created, were set for release at 1530 local/1830 GMT.

Earlier Thursday, Economy Minister Roque Fernandez told reporters in London that the May jobless survey would probably show a drop to about 16.2 percent. ((--Patrick Adam, Buenos Aires newsroom, 541 318-0618))
